name: Purchase Transaction with Stored Payment Instrument
descriptionHtml:
Request:

POST - https://fargate.test.payall.com/v1/acquiring/process

raw 
  {
    "program_id": "1b1476f8-3b30-4e94-8b8b-e7b312e6d5c8",
    "merchant_id": "016fd8c3-f677-a782-122d-2b55e30c93ce",
    "type": "PURCHASE",
    "amount": 12.5,
    "currency_code": "USD",
    "reference": "da040abf-314c-41fd-b556-PURCHASETEST",
    "stored_payment_instrument": {
        "id": "017a38b0-f778-fb6b-37d2-5a08a2868c80",
        "security_code": "123"
    },
    "payment_instrument": null
}

Response:

200 - OK 

  {"data":{"id":"017a8a04-b5de-c672-127d-5b65c706d70a","program_id":"1b1476f8-3b30-4e94-8b8b-e7b312e6d5c8","merchant_id":"016fd8c3-f677-a782-122d-2b55e30c93ce","terminal_id":null,"currency_code":"USD","amount":12.50,"type":"PURCHASE","status":"APPROVED","reference":"da040abf-314c-41fd-b556-PURCHASETEST","payment_instrument_id":"017a38b0-f778-fb6b-37d2-5a08a2868c80","originaltransaction_id":null,"auth_id":"OK1874","fd_merchant_id":"RCTST1000084652","bank_net_data":null,"fd_terminal_id":"00000001","created_at":"2021-07-09T06:46:42Z","status_code":null,"status_desc":null,"avs_result_code":null,"ccv_result_code":null,"response_date":null,"addtl_resp_data":"APPROVAL","sttlm_date":null,"ath_ntwk_id":"02","ath_ntwk_nm":"VISA","rt_ind":null,"sig_ind":null,"error_data":null,"debit_trace_num":null,"ath_ntwk_trc_id":null,"settlement_txn_type":null,"print_data":null,"assoc_resp_code":null}}
